review: I've been on this drug 7 weeks now 50 mg per week & I was told 12 weeks till I will feel its full potential,I'm only starting to see results now my genital skin flares are horrendous much worse than any joint pain I have experienced I still flared but it cleared up within a week which normally would take anything up to 2 weeks

Enbrel (etanercept):Had my second 50mg injection (done weekly) in the doctor's office today.  No negative side effects yet.  Metal taste for several hours after the injection.  Mouth sores are gone.  Still taking 200mg of Imuran daily in conjunction.  Thinking I feel a little less fatigued.  Time will tell.
